title: FS: NEW 24 Card T205 Beater Lot w/ HOF, SP, and Sovereign/AB backs
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS: NEW 24 Card T205 Beater Lot w/ HOF, SP, and Sovereign/AB backs
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T205 cards available for sale or trade. Condition should be accurately reflected by the scans.  All of these cards (except the graded Shean, of course) are obviously extremely low grade and all have significant condition issues.

Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards...3 or more ship for free. I accept payment via any method you prefer and will gladly consider trades for anything that I need from any other sets. I collect just about everything. Thanks for looking and please feel free to send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] with any questions or to reserve cards.

CARDS PICTURED (removing **SOLD** cards for easier viewing):

Bergen (Sovereign, card in two pieces) - $7
Herzog (Hassan, miscut double border on back) - $18
Herzog (Sovereign, miscut double border on back) - $16
Reulbach - $12
Richie (Sovereign) - $11
Scanlan (card in three pieces) - $10

pm sent.
all the best,
barry
